turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order some Pizza Hut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what can I get for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one large pan crust pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One large pan. What toppings do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Onion, mushrooms and italian beef.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sorry, but italian beef is not offered. Would you like something else on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright then, instead of italian beef give me ham.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's one large onion, mushroom and ham pizza on a pan crust. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can I get anything else for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the one pizza, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total for the pizza will be $16.45. Should I place the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I placed your order. It will be available for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Is there anything else I can help with today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all I wanted.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, have a nice day!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good bye.
